Events that occurred on 18 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1905 - Actress Marjorie Westbury is born.
1914 - The Chequers Clubbe, founded by J.R.R. Tolkien, meet to have dinner.
1917 - Actor Richard Boone is born.
1929 - Priscilla Tolkien is born.
1956 - Actor Dominic Guard is born.
2002 - The Standard Deviants: Rings, Kings and Things is released.
2007 - The History of The Hobbit volume 2: Return to Bag-End is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
Arwen's party travel toward Minas Tirith.
